page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN 1985
page.content: People work very hard in this area and have many different jobs.There are farmers who own their farms,farmers who manage their farms and the farm workers. There are many self-employed people who work in the building trade,as gardeners,shopkeepers,caterers, mechanics.There are professional people such as doctors,dentists, accountants,architects,consultant engineers,teachers.There are people who work as postman,milkmen,van drivers,publicans,in banks,as secretaries,shopworkers. Housewives have jobs during the day as cleaners and shop assistants, secretaries and child minders.This work fits in with running their homes and looking after their children. There is also unemployment in this area-mainly people in council houses.
